features: FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: Our All Natural Fabric Softener Dryer Sheet is gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin. Our fabric softener is free of animal products and contains only natural, plant-based ingredients, and recyclable packaging.
SOFT & STATIC FREE: These eco friendly dryer sheets are scientifically formulated with clean ingredients to leave your clothes feeling soft with reduced static cling

GOOD FOR YOU, GOOD FOR THE ENVIRONMENT: Our all natural dryer sheets have completely plastic free packaging and are powered by natural, plant based ingredients. That means no phosphates, parabens, phthalates, chlorine bleach, artificial dyes, petroleum, ammonia!

MADE WITH ESSENTIAL OILS: Unlike others, our dryer sheets are not scented with synthetic fragrances but with all natural essential oils. 160 Sheets of Clean People Fabric Softener with a great Fresh Scent. Thats 160 soft & static free loads!
VEGAN & CRUELTY FREE: Unlike most Dryer Sheets, which are made with animal fats (yuck!), our Dryer Sheets use plant-based softening ingredients. We’ll also never test Clean People on animals, ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY USE. Great cleaning and NO heavy Plastic container. VERY Soft scented. NOT heavy smell
reviews.reviewText: I had just had surgery. It was hard to lug the heavy plastic container without spilling. The bottles took up most of the shelf.I saw these and had to try.They have worked wonderfully. Always dissolving no matter the size of my load. (Though I had seen some comments about these not dissolving.)The laundry room smell fresh from the dryer and laundry sheets. When placed into the wash or dryer the smell become soft barely noticable. I am gratefull because it lets the clothes smell air fresh clean and not chemical or overly perfumed.The dryer sheets provide a softness with oily feeling that many softners leave behind.It was an extra bonus to find 2 products that will not cause my skin to break out due to harsh chemicals.NO Plastic! Great for the enviroment. No mess! Takes up less room! Not heavy to pickup! Fresh laundry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this one!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve tried many fabric softener products. I don’t like dryer sheets and I don’t use plastic bottles. I tried the wool balls, the pods you just throw in the dryer, and fabric softener in a box. The balls are cute but don’t do anything for static. The pods don’t work at all. The fabric softener in the box is great but the one I was using is no longer available on subscribe and save and is very expensive. I watched another video on this product and the woman mentioned the dryer sheets could be used over and over again. I don’t like dryer sheets but decided to try these. First, they smell AMAZING. My laundry is in a small bathroom so the whole room smells so delicious now. Second, THEY ACTUALLY WORK. I put one sheet in a load. Everything came out smelling so good, feeling so soft, with NO STATIC. The sheets feel different than others. I could tell the one sheet I used could be used again. I used it a second time on a larger comforter and it worked great! Soft and NO STATIC. The packaging is recyclable, they’re made with essential oils, they’re vegan, and made in the U. S. The price is great, especially because they can be used more than once. This is a great product. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Scent doesn’t last long. Clothes still have static. Need to use more sheets than directed if you want to actually smell it on your clothes. Like DOUBLE TO TRIPLE the amount. Still doesn’t last long but will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Environmental friendly product.
reviews.reviewText: Lavender scented eco friendly dryer sheets. They have a lovely scent and do the job of softening and removing static cling. This is the only dryer sheet I buy now. Great product!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the dryer sheets with the detergent sheets! The fresh & clean smell is amazing, makes our clothes soft! All the products are also great for our skin, no problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unscented dryer sheets not effective
reviews.reviewText: I’m reviewing the unscented dryer sheets. I wish reviews related only to the product purchased, not seemingly every item a vendor sells. All I know is that these do not stop static cling. They cling to my clothes and there is static when removing clothes from the dryer. They also have a somewhat unpleasant smell in the box. Coming out of the dryer, clothes smell fine though. Maybe the scented work better, I don’t know, but I usually prefer unscented products. I’m disappointed, because I did like their unscented detergent sheets and found those effective, but will not be buying their dryer sheets again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dryer sheets won’t go back!
reviews.reviewText: These dryer sheets are absolutely amazing! They smell great and they get ALL the static and dog hair off your clothes best part is they are made with clean ingredients I will never go back to the big names dryer sheets ever again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for eco conscious users
reviews.reviewText: These smell nice and add some fluff without all the harmful chemicals. I will continue to use and purchase in the future.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the idea of a clean product
reviews.reviewText: They don’t leave a smell like regular dryer sheets, hardly noticeable fragrance.I just don’t like how the sheets are cut in different sizes some are nearly an inch wide so I have to go digging through the sleeves to find them. Plus they don’t cut out all the static so I’m using an extra sheet.It’s a toss up if I purchase these ones again.
I think thus would have been good product except the box was musty smelly which transferred to all the fragrance free dryer sheets. Making them unusable. So disappointing.
I won’t purchase again. They have a bit of a chemical smell, and they are leaving oily marks on my dark clothing
